objects.text: 925 Sterling Silver • Rose Gold Plated • Certificate of Authenticity • 6 Month Warranty
Gift for Girlfriend • Wife • Women & Girls

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner features a luxurious design intended for promoting fine jewelry. The background is a soft radial gradient blending gentle pink tones with decorative curved lines and light bokeh dots, creating a dreamy and romantic ambiance. At the center, the product image (id: "product_image") attracts attention with its fine detail and clarity.

The banner includes a bold, all-caps headline (id: "heading") in a serif display font, emphasizing sophistication. Beneath it lies a delicate subheading (id: "subheading") in a refined serif font, adding a lyrical touch. A feature description (id: "description") highlights material and warranty details.

The price (id: "price") is prominently displayed in large, bold type. Below it, a rounded rectangular call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") with a contrasting white label "SHOP NOW" (id: "cta") promotes user interaction. A subtle tagline (id: "tagline") at the bottom suggests ideal recipients.

**Color Palette**:
- Soft Pink Gradient: `#FFF0F5`, `#F8C8DC`, `#FFE4E1`
- Deep Mauve Text: `#8E4A64`, `#73344D`, `#A96987`
- White Call-to-Action Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a delicate blend of rose gold (#F4A6A6) and sparkling crystal whites (#FFFFFF) with hints of translucent pink (#F9B5C4) and champagne-toned highlights (#F7E7CE). The rose gold forms the structural frame of the earrings, exuding warmth and elegance. The white gemstones contrast sharply, enhancing the luxurious feel, while the pink teardrop forms add softness and sophistication. The colors are seamlessly integrated—rose gold encircles and hugs each stone, forming a radiant cohesion that feels both feminine and modern. For an advertisement banner, a pastel background with gradients of blush pink and champagne hues would effectively reflect this glamor.
